content.text: Welcome to my portfolio website. Explore my projects and experience.

about.heading: Creating beautiful websites that inspire and engage is my passion.
about.content: I'm a 22-year-old on a mission to turn passion into profession. Self-taught and hungry to contribute, I'm actively seeking my debut as a programmer. Dive into my digital playground, where logic meets creativity. Let's code a brighter future together! ðŸ’»âœ¨

benefits.heading: Discover the potential of a junior frontend developer
benefits.content: As a junior frontend developer, I bring fresh ideas and a passion for creating engaging websites. With my expertise, you can expect innovative designs and seamless user experiences.

expertise.heading: Expertise
expertise.content: I have a solid understanding of frontend development and bring valuable experience to every project.

quality.heading: Quality
quality.content: I am committed to delivering websites that are visually stunning, user-friendly, and performant.

skills.heading: Skills and Technologies I Specialize In
skills.content: I specialize in a range of skills and technologies that allow me to create dynamic and user-friendly websites.

list.name: HTML and CSS
list.text: I have a strong foundation in HTML and CSS, ensuring that the websites I build are visually appealing and well-structured.

list.name: JavaScript
list.text: I am proficient in JavaScript, allowing me to add interactivity and functionality to websites.

list.name: Responsive Design
list.text: I specialize in creating responsive designs that adapt to different screen sizes and devices.

list.name: TypeScript
list.text: I have  experience in TypeScript development, leveraging its strong typing system to build robust and scalable applications.

list.name: React
list.text: As a skilled React developer, I can create interactive user interfaces and build reusable components to enhance the user experience.

list.name: NextJS
list.text: With NextJS, I can develop server-side rendered React applications, providing fast and optimized performance.

projects.heading: Highlighting My Work
projects.text: Explore my portfolio and see my latest projects.

list.title: Ara
list.info: An application that enables real-time social media interactions.

list.title: Movies REST API
list.info: A RESTful API for accessing movie information.

list.title: Interactive comments section
list.info: An interactive comment section with real-time updates using localStorage.

list.title: Image carousel
list.info: A beautiful display of images with seamless transitions.

list.title: Rock, paper, scissors
list.info: An easy game of rock, paper, scissors.

list.title: IP Address Tracker
list.info: Track the location of any IP address

list.title: Countdown timer
list.info: A basic timer that counts down.

list.title: Two factor code input
list.info: An authentication system that requires a two-factor code for added security.
